name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AICAPN - Your new AI parrot assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arrr, AICAPN be the ultimate browser matey! Smooth sailin' and hearty humor guaranteed from yours truly, Steve.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏴‍☠️Ahoy, me hearties! Ye be in for a treat, 'cause AI Cap'n be bringin' ol' Steve, the AI pirate parrot, straight to yer very own browser in a nifty little side bar to help ye with anythin' ye be needin'. This swashbucklin' app be fueled by yer own OpenAI API Key, so ye can pay fer what ye use!

That was from Steve. Here’s what AI Cap’n is, minus the pirate talk. 

AI Cap’n brings a ChatGPT-powered AI assistant your browser via a sidebar. 

- 💨 Accessible in seconds with with a keyboard shortcut
- 🔥 1-click copy chat text
- 🌓 Dark mode
- 🔑 Use your own API key
